title: SUPERSONIC REPLICA (Dyson Project)
description: In an internship at Dyson under the Embedded Software Team. I worked on replicating the SuperSonic hair dryer. The project involved reverse engineering the device to understand its components and functionality. I contributed to the development of a prototype that mimics the original's performance, focusing on the motor control and heating elements.
materials: NXP Board, I2C LCD, DC Motor, Potentiometer
